name: ReflectionsforRecovery
0:
”Alexa, open Recovery Reflections”
”Tell me my Daily Reflection”
”What's today's quote?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recovery reflections
des: Hear the most thought-provoking, inspirational, and meaningful quotes from the critical works used throughout the Alcoholics Anonymous program. Each time you activate this skill, you can hear a quote that will help you work through the twelve steps and continue on your path to recovery. Whether you are considering getting sober, or working your sobriety plan on a daily basis, this app can help aid in the process. It can be your on-demand AA meeting!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
